dcterms:creator: Z. Gantner
S. Rendle
C. Freudenthaler
L. Schmidt-Thieme
dcterms:description: A rather small version of the Movielens dataset, with 6040 users and 1,000,209 ratings over 3706 movies. This dataset has extra information about the users (age, sex, occupation) and about the movies (year, genre).
dcterms:title: Movielens 1M

dcterms:creator: Z. Gantner
S. Rendle
C. Freudenthaler
L. Schmidt-Thieme
dcterms:description: A much larger dataset, with about 480k users and 100M ratings over 17770 movies.
dcterms:title: Netflix
